FuncDef: The default action specifies the action that is applied to events when no action is specified in the event filter entries or when an event does not match the specified criteria.

ParaDef.Info: The events which are not explicitly forwarded by an event filter match are dropped.
The events which are not explicitly dropped by an event filter match are forwarded.

ExtraInfo: Default: default-action forward - The events which are not explicitly dropped by an event filter match are forwarded.
